readers.type: Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Content.DictionaryReader`2[[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089],[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]]

content.6/f Maru 500/p Maru: breezy/20 19/farmer 9 20 1 Maru 22 20 1 Demetrius 19 18 0 Robin 13 6 0 Sebastian -100 -100 2/skippable/move farmer 7 0 1/faceDirection Maru 3/faceDirection Demetrius 3/speak Maru "啊，你好！"/move farmer 1 0 1/speak Maru "我和我爸正對土壤樣本進行測試呢。"/pause 800/emote farmer 40/speak Maru "不要害羞嘛！我們正缺人手呢。$h"/move farmer 4 0 1/faceDirection Demetrius 2/speak Maru "能幫我看一下這個燒杯嗎？我去取最後一批樣本。#$b#我去去就回。"/pause 400/move farmer 0 -1 1/move farmer 1 0 1/faceDirection Demetrius 0/speed Maru 4/move Maru -16 0 3/speed Maru 4/move Maru 0 3 2/move Maru 0 1 2/warp Maru -100 -100/playSound doorClose/faceDirection Demetrius 2/speak Demetrius "多謝你幫忙， @。"/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 500/faceDirection Demetrius 0/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 1000/speak Demetrius "瑪魯是個乖孩子。她可是我的小乖乖……"/pause 500/faceDirection Demetrius 2/stopMusic/pause 800/speak Demetrius "我可不想有什麼東西妨礙她光明的未來，你懂我的意思吧？$5"/pause 400/faceDirection farmer 3/emote farmer 8/faceDirection Demetrius 0/speak Demetrius "平時多想想這事吧……*輕笑*$h"/playSound doorClose/warp Maru 6 24/playMusic kindadumbautumn/move Maru 0 -4 1/emote farmer 40 true/move Maru 3 0 1/faceDirection farmer 1 true/move Maru 8 0 1/speak Maru "啊，真是抱歉了。在我不在的時候你們有話題聊吧？"/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Demetrius 3/pause 500/speak Demetrius "……我剛剛在和@說我們測試的土壤樣本的事。"/pause 500/faceDirection Demetrius 2/speak Demetrius "$q 15933 null#我說的沒錯吧， @?#$r 15933 10 Event_Lab_Silence#（什麼也不說）#$r 15933 -100 Event_Lab_Rat#其實，你爸剛剛可神秘了。"/fork DadWeird/pause 500/speak Maru "好的！那麼， @…… 我來告訴你如何使用儀器。"/move Maru 4 0 1/faceDirection Demetrius 2/move Maru 0 1 1/move Maru 1 0 0/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 500/end Maru1
content.DadWeird: speak Maru "蛤？爸，你跟他說什麼了？$a^蛤？爸，你跟她說什麼了？$a"/pause 500/faceDirection Demetrius 2/emote Demetrius 28/speak Demetrius "好啦，好啦……我們在說你啊，小寶貝。$5#$b#我想和 @ 說說你的事……但是又怕你難為情……我不該對你說謊的。$s"/faceDirection Demetrius 0/pause 300/emote Maru 28/move Maru 2 0 0/speak Maru "沒事的，爸爸。我們能理解的。#$b#趁樣本還沒結晶我們最好趕緊回去工作。"/faceDirection Demetrius 2/emote Demetrius 32/move Maru 3 0 1/faceDirection Demetrius 0/faceDirection farmer 1/end Maru1

2/pause 200/move Maru 0 1 1/move Maru 2 0 2/move Maru 0 2 2/doAction 7 10/speak Maru "@，嗨！請進。"/move Maru 0 -2 3/move Maru -2 0 0/move Maru 0 -1 1/move farmer 0 -5 3/speak Maru "我在搞一個新項目……是很了不起的東西哦。"/pause 1000/speak Maru "這只是其中一種成分……我給你示範一下。"/pause 500/speak Maru "把你的手放在這裡……"/pause 300/animate farmer true true 100 35/pause 800/speak Maru "然後打開開關……"/stopMusic/pause 500/showFrame Maru 24/pause 100/showFrame Maru 25/pause 100/showFrame Maru 16/pause 1000/showFrame Maru 17/pause 100/showFrame Maru 18/pause 100/playSound openBox/pause 800/playSound 4/move Maru 0 -2 0/pause 100/playSound openBox/speed Maru 4/move Maru 0 2 3/speed Maru 4/move Maru -2 0 0/speak Maru "來，我給你塗燙傷藥膏。$8"/pause 500/playSound slimeHit/pause 600/playSound healSound/temporarySprite 7 5 4 8 80 false .99/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1500/speak Maru "$q 41 null#真是對不起。$8#$r 41 30 Event_Cut1#沒關係，根本不痛的。#$r 41 -50 Event_Cut2#抱歉就對了。簡直痛死人了！"/faceDirection Maru 2/showFrame Maru 26/pause 800/speak Maru "氣氛一下就毀了，是吧？*唉*$s"/faceDirection Maru 2/pause 500/move Maru -1 0 3/move farmer 0 1 3/pause 500/emote farmer 28/pause 1500/end
content.25/f Demetrius 1500/p Demetrius/p Robin: jaunty/-1000 -1000/farmer -10 -10 0 Demetrius 6 21 3 Robin 5 21 1/skippable/showFrame Demetrius 28/viewport 6 21 true/pause 900/speak Robin "德米特里厄斯，我跟你說的是拿水果來。不是拿番茄來。"/emote Demetrius 8/speak Demetrius "真是搞不懂。番茄就是水果啊！"/emote Robin 12/speak Robin "只要是正常人，說想要水果的時候，要的都絕對不會是番茄的。這與番茄在科學上的分類無關。"/warp farmer 6 24/playSound doorClose/pause 500/showFrame Demetrius 29/faceDirection Robin 2/speak Demetrius "@！你來的正好。你幫我們解決這個爭端最合適不過了。"/move farmer 0 -2 0/emote farmer 8/speak Demetrius "$q 59 null#你覺得番茄算什麼？#$r 59 -30 Event_tomato1#蔬菜#$r 59 50 Event_tomato2#水果"/pause 500/showFrame Demetrius 28/speak Demetrius "我只想告訴你我的觀點。#$b#每次你跟我說些什麼的時候，我都感覺很難做出推斷呢。"/pause 300/faceDirection Robin 1/pause 300/speak Demetrius "但我會盡力的。"/pause 600/emote Robin 20/pause 300/showFrame Demetrius 29/pause 600/speak Demetrius "謝謝你的幫助， @。$h"/pause 800/end
content.33/f Robin 1500/p Robin: jaunty/5 17/farmer 6 24 0 Robin 5 17 3/move farmer 0 -3 1/move farmer -1 0 0/move farmer 0 -3 0/pause 200/faceDirection Robin 2/speak Robin "嗨 @。我正給鋸子清灰呢。"/pause 400/faceDirection Robin 3/pause 500/faceDirection Robin 2/speak Robin "$q 66 null#你有沒有用木頭做過東西呢， @?#$r 66 50 event_wood1#有#$r 66 50 event_wood2#沒有"/pause 500/speak Robin "我覺得憑咱倆的關係，已經可以把我木匠的訣竅告訴你啦！$h#$b#來，我給你看看設計圖。"/move Robin 2 0 1/pause 600/playSound openBox/pause 600/move Robin -2 0 2/pause 400/playMusic none/playSound coin/pause 1500/playSound reward/addCraftingRecipe Flute Block/addCraftingRecipe Drum Block/message "學會製作「長笛塊」和「鼓塊」"/pause 700/speak Robin "可以用這些來在農場上發揮想像力。#$b#用自己製作的東西裝飾農場感覺很棒！$h"/pause 700/end
content.10/f Maru 2500/t 900 1600: none/-1000 -1000/farmer 7 9 0 Maru 7 6 2 Demetrius 12 12 2/skippable/showFrame Demetrius 16/viewport 5 6 true/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 400/speak Maru "嘿，我正想去找你呢。#$b#還記得我和你說的新項目嗎？特了不起的那個？"/pause 500/move Maru 0 1 2/speak Maru "嗯……終於完成了，我想給你看看。"/pause 500/move Maru -2 0 1/speak Maru "跟我來。"/move Maru -3 0 3/move farmer 0 -1 3/playSound true/playMusic Hospital_Ambient/addTemporaryActor robot 35 42 6 4 2 false/showFrame robot 4/warp farmer 3 5/warp Maru 4 4/warp Demetrius -100 -100/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection Maru 1/viewport 6 4 true/pause 900/move Maru 1 0 1/pause 1000/speak Maru "這就是……瑪魯互動型實驗室器材阿爾法實驗性……我管她叫做……「瑪麗爾達」。"/move farmer 1 0 1/emote farmer 16/pause 500/faceDirection Maru 3/speak Maru "我已經搞了好幾個月了……#$b#我就等著你一起啟動她了。$l"/pause 500/faceDirection Maru 1/speak Maru "那麼，要啟動了……"/showFrame Maru 24/pause 100/showFrame Maru 25/pause 100/showFrame Maru 16/pause 1000/showFrame Maru 17/pause 100/showFrame Maru 18/pause 100/playSound openBox/pause 400/faceDirection Maru 1/pause 400/playSound robotSoundEffects/temporarySprite 5 4 27 8 50/pause 450/shake robot 2500/temporarySprite 8 4 27 8 50 true/pause 1030/temporarySprite 8 3 27 8 50 true/pause 2500/showFrame robot 1/animate robot false false 100 1 2 9 10 9 0/pause 650/animate robot false false 200 2 9 10 9 0/pause 1000/shake robot 1000/animate robot false false 150 1 2 1 0 1 2 1/pause 600/stopAnimation robot/showFrame robot 11/jump robot/pause 600/showFrame robot 8/temporarySprite 5 4 27 8 50/temporarySprite 8 4 27 8 50 true/pause 2000/showFrame robot 1/pause 1000/showFrame robot 7/pause 1000/message "你好，瑪魯。"/emote Maru 32/message "不用回應我……我已經預測到你的回答了。"/emote Maru 16 true/faceDirection Demetrius 2/warp Demetrius 3 5/playSound doorClose/pause 10/faceDirection farmer 1 true/faceDirection Maru 1/speak Demetrius "啊哈！我就知道！$4"/pause 600/faceDirection Demetrius 1/pause 200/showFrame Demetrius 18/shake Demetrius 800/jump Demetrius/pause 600/speak Demetrius "呀!這是什麼東西？！$6"/move Maru 0 1 3/faceDirection Demetrius 1/speak Maru "爸，冷靜點。這是我的新發明，‘瑪麗爾達’。$8"/pause 600/showFrame robot 8/pause 700/showFrame robot 1/pause 500/showFrame robot 7/pause 500/message "你好，德米特里厄斯。"/showFrame Demetrius 18/shake Demetrius 600/pause 400/speak Demetrius "我的老天爺！這東西還會說話！$6"/move Demetrius 0 1 1/move Demetrius 1 0 1/faceDirection farmer 2 true/move Demetrius 1 0 1/faceDirection Maru 2 true/move Demetrius 1 0 0/pause 400/speak Demetrius "你這幾個月把自己鎖在房間裡就是在搞這個？$5"/pause 300/showFrame robot 1/pause 600/speak Demetrius "……我還以為你和 @在這下面玩來著呢……$s"/showFrame Maru 27/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump Maru/jump farmer/pause 1500/stopAnimation farmer/showFrame Maru 0/faceDirection Maru 2/speak Maru "爸！我搞這個是為了給你和媽用的。$a#$b#瑪麗爾達的作用就是在實驗室幫助你，在木匠桌幫助媽……這樣我不在的時候你們就不會那麼辛苦了。$8"/pause 500/showFrame robot 7/playMusic echos/pause 500/message "抱歉啊……"/faceDirection Maru 1/faceDirection farmer 1/message "對不起，瑪魯可我不想當你的僕人。"/pause 500/showFrame robot 1/pause 1000/message "在你啟動我之後的這一段時間，我一直在用你給我核心安裝的自我認知模組研究我到底是什麼。"/showFrame robot 1/message "很抱歉讓大家失望，但我不能被你們關在這裡。我已經決定要去銀河中搜索其它人工合成的生命體了。"/speak Maru "什麼！？等等！$9"/pause 800/faceDirection Demetrius 2/pause 1000/showFrame Demetrius 19/pause 3000/showFrame Demetrius 0/pause 500/move Demetrius -1 0 0/faceDirection Maru 2/speak Demetrius "沒事的，瑪魯。讓瑪麗爾達去吧。$5#$b#我和你媽會照顧好自己的。我知道你已準備好開始屬於自己的新生活了，而我也接受了以後你不在身邊的這件事了。#$b#另外，你這個……作品似乎很先進。把她關在這裡似乎有點大材小用了。"/pause 800/showFrame robot 8/pause 500/showFrame robot 7/pause 500/showFrame Maru 26/move Demetrius -1 0 0/faceDirection farmer 2/speak Demetrius "@，之前誤會你真是抱歉。你是個好小伙子。$5^@，之前誤會你真是抱歉。你是個好姑娘。$5#$b#我從沒看過瑪魯如此活躍而有創意……也從未如此驕傲過。如果這是因為你的幫助，那我真的要感謝你"/move Demetrius -1 0 0/move Demetrius 0 -1 0/warp Demetrius -1000 -1000/playSound doorClose/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/showFrame Maru 0/pause 100/faceDirection Maru 3/speak Maru "……$8"/pause 1000/faceDirection Maru 1/speak Maru "好了，瑪麗爾達。我們快從這狹窄的地方出去吧。"/playMusic spring_day_ambient/globalFade/viewport -5000 -5000/changeLocation Mountain/warp Maru 11 28/warp farmer 10 29/warp robot 13 28/showFrame robot 1/viewport 12 27 clamp/pause 2000/showFrame robot 7/pause 1000/message "多謝你創造了我，瑪魯。我不會忘記你的。"/pause 500/showFrame robot 1/pause 1000/playSound robotBLASTOFF/specificTemporarySprite robot/warp robot -2000 -2000/pause 3000/faceDirection Maru 0 true/faceDirection farmer 0 true/viewport move 0 -1 2000/pause 2500/playMusic kindadumbautumn/cutscene robot/pause 3000/speak Maru "看她跑得多歡……$8"/pause 1600/emote Maru 40/pause 500/move farmer 0 -1 1/pause 500/faceDirection Maru 3/pause 800/speak Maru "$q 18981 null#那麼，你覺得怎麼樣呢， @?#$r 18981 50 event_robot1#我認為你的發明很厲害。#$r 18981 -50 event_robot2#我很失望……你不該讓那機器人成為你的奴隸的。#$r 18981 0 event_robot3#看來你爸對我們在一起是沒意見囉？#$r 18981 0 event_robot4#（盯著瑪魯，什麼也不說）"/fork BadAnswer/faceDirection Maru 1/pause 300/faceDirection Maru 0/pause 300/faceDirection Maru 2/pause 300/faceDirection Maru content.1053978/n robinDeluxeBed: distantBanjo/-1000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 0 Robin 5 20 3 Demetrius 7 20 3 Maru 8 18 2 Sebastian 3 23 0/skippable/specificTemporarySprite staticSprite TileSheets\\furniture 160 1087 48 64 2.25 18/positionOffset Robin 32 0/viewport 5 22 true/pause 3000/speak Robin "瞧！我的最新作品。$h#$b#是一張用本地硬木打造的豪華四柱帷幔床。"/pause 400/emote Demetrius 8/speak Demetrius "呃……羅賓？這四根柱子有什麼用？我覺得這是在浪費材料。$s"/emote Robin 12/faceDirection Robin 1/speak Robin "朋友，這是「美觀」……你說，是不是大家看起來都覺得賞心悅目？$6"/emote Demetrius 8/speak Demetrius "唔，我明白你的意思了。不過也不能為了美觀影響了這個睡覺容器的實用性和效率啊。"/pause 500/jump Robin/pause 500/speak Robin "我說，有的時候你感覺像是在裝傻充愣，搞得我很惱火。是這樣嗎？$3"/pause 100/animate Demetrius true true 100 18/shake Demetrius 1000/emote Maru 28 true/emote Sebastian 12 true/jump Demetrius/pause 1000/stopAnimation Demetrius/pause 400/warp farmer 6 24/playSound doorClose/move farmer 0 -1 0/faceDirection Robin 2 true/faceDirection Demetrius 2 true/faceDirection Sebastian 1/speak Robin "嘿，@……進來吧。"/move farmer 0 -2 0/speak Robin "看看這個……多虧你收集了那麼多硬木，我才能做出來這張床。"/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Robin 3 true/faceDirection Demetrius 3/pause 300/speak Robin "你覺得怎麼樣？"/quickQuestion #美學設計棒極了#四根柱子看起來有點浪費(break)faceDirection Sebastian 0 true\textAboveHead Sebastian "嗯"\emote Robin 20 true\emote Demetrius 12\pause 2000\move Demetrius 15 0 1 true\pause 500\speak Demetrius "咳咳……呃……我去自閉一會……$5"(break)emote Demetrius 32\speak Demetrius "英雄所見略同……$h"\emote Robin 12 \speak Robin "隨便你們了。$3#$b#我繼續……$3"/pause 1000/speak Robin "既然我把原型做出來了，那就可以在店裡賣了。"/faceDirection Robin 2/speak Robin "嘿，@……這些可能很適合你的屋子！你覺得呢……要買一點嗎？"/faceDirection farmer 2 true/startJittering/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/pause 200/textAboveHead Maru "媽媽！"/pause 1000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
